    public class GwtTable
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements TableControl.IsTableControlWidget, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasAllFocusHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasAllKeyHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasClickHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasDoubleClickHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.ClickHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.KeyDownHandler, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.RequiresResize, de.esoco.lib.model.Callback<de.esoco.lib.model.RemoteDataModel<de.esoco.lib.model.DataModel<?>>>
    A GWT-implementation of a composite that can display tabular data. It also supports the display of hierarchical data.

        Creates a new instance.

        bHierarchical - If TRUE the table will display instances of HierarchicalDataModel as a tree
